Reviews.Title: Canon EOS Rebel T3i  package deal
Reviews.Author: Penelope Towle
Reviews.Content: Love this camera.  Takes beautiful shots, still learning how to use all the bells and whistles. :)  I recommend it highly.  Good beginner, high end camera.

Reviews.Title: Awesome kit
Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice starter kit.  Shipment was fast and everything is as described.Trust this dealer with confidence.

ProductInfo.Features:
Brand New w/All Supplied Accessories
18.0 MP CMOS sensor and DIGIC 4 Image Processor for high image quality and speed.
Improved EOS Full HD Movie mode with manual exposure control, expanded recording with new Movie Digital zoom
3.0-inch Vari-Angle Clear View LCD; Built-in flash; Full HD movie mode at 1920 x 1080 resolution
Compatible with full line of Canon EF and EF-S lenses
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ 18-55mm IS II & Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens Package 3
